html:
2.7.20  10:43 pm   what happened to the porridge you heated for the wrong amount of time?

     absolutely nothing

2.7.20  10:43 pm   What is you're opinion on lamps?

     too dark

2.7.20  10:37 pm   hi bill, how do you write intros and interludes?

     i'm not sure

     all of ur interludes really connect the different verses and that's what i'm trying to to in my own songs

     you just have to follow the principle. what happens first, what happens next, what happens next, etc. ... Make sure you always play it fresh from the beginning so you can get as clear an experience of how it has gone so far. The one thing that is really impossible, which i can't explain how to do, and almost can't do, is figure out what came before

2.7.20  10:17 pm   Help I don't know where I am

     you are here

2.7.20  10:12 pm   Do you ever say "Fuck this" and just nap?

     fuck this

2.7.20  9:46 pm   Favorite bird?

     the regular bird

2.7.20  9:45 pm   the year is 2120,

     that's not true

     bill has taken over the world, all the questions that will be asked will be replaced by a automated message, he says its to reduce spam, he has ascended and we cant stop him, but only one question remains,why do we exist

     ? that question must have already been answered 1000 times on here. yes, it keeps returning, and it's always very good to see it. but the problem is, the trajectory of your story made it actually sound like that question has not appeared here, and yet it is one of the most common questions which i have answered in many different ways, and also many times the same way, and some of those other different ways at additional times also

2.7.20  9:35 pm   I might be happy. Is that normal,

     somewhat

      or should I be worried?

     the bad news is, happiness will not stay forever. but the good news is it will keep coming back, forever

2.7.20  9:30 pm   Hey, I really like the production of your music! Have you ever thought of making post- industrial neo folkish jazz? no y u es

     no

2.7.20  9:22 pm   Mr. Wurtz, you seem to answer at least one question every hour of every day.

     that's not true. the answers arrive mostly all within the same hour, or possibly 2 separate hours, each day

      Do you sleep,

     yes

      or is it all robots?

     robots can sleep too actually, they can sleep much deeper

2.7.20  9:18 pm   What do I do

      you could re-invent the fortress. it's damn near time that thing got a re-invent

2.7.20  8:55 pm   Are minor keys a thing of the past? Obsolete?

     no

2.7.20  8:20 pm   Do you know the meaning of life is

     it keeps changing

2.7.20  7:08 pm   what's your favorite two letter word?

     if

2.7.20  7:01 pm   plants are pretty great, huh

     yes. i am looking for a good way to depict them

2.7.20  6:55 pm   are you a baguette?

     no

2.7.20  6:10 pm   I love your videos, how do you come up with the vague lyrics that can relate to ANYONE?

     i think you have to come up with insanely specific lyrics for a while, until finally there is no where else to escape the more down right homewardly lyrics from visiting you in your dreams

2.7.20  6:01 pm   May you give me an idea of a question i should ask?

     yes, please ask a question like this

2.7.20  5:52 pm   Do you particularly relish the form of musical art that is considered jazz music?

     i have found it no longer sensible to keep track of what is or is not considered jazz music, but the word jazz remains a very unique word with a huge amount of Zs

2.7.20  5:40 pm   what if pasta stopped

     the whole town will have to get together and start it again

2.7.20  5:04 pm   Is anything we learn in school useful in life? 

     yes, although it might not have been in the curriculum

2.7.20  4:59 pm   Do you have any song ideas for the future similar to "all u gotta do is?"

     there are some similar things written near the same time period

     I love the upbeat tempo and harmonies, and it's a shame that it's only 45 seconds long.

2.7.20  4:38 pm   Do you know the last digit of pi?

     no

2.7.20  4:34 pm   Is Australia a real place???

     oh that would explain a lot

2.7.20  4:20 pm   tiktok seems to be vine 2.0. ever think of getting back into doing short-form stuff again?

     yes, that would be an extremely useful endeavor for me right now. there are now 4 apps/sites that are good for this, and i am ready to use all of them

2.7.20  4:15 pm   favorite stevie wonder song?

     if it's magic

2.7.20  4:01 pm   I just transcribed the melody to the bridge on mt st helens is about to blow up. was there a point to this?

     yes. you probably wanted to understand where the heck the key changes were taking it. at least that would be my reason for studying a section like that. would also check the chords too

2.7.20  3:57 pm   Quick servery about the soap: how are you liking it so far 

     not dirty enough

2.7.20  3:46 pm   my process to finding chords is to randomly combine notes of a major scale until it sounds like what I hear in my head. this is bad, or not?

     does it sound bad

2.7.20  3:30 pm   how to play the music in my mind but quickly and accurately

     quickness and accuracy comes naturally the more time you spend with music

2.7.20  3:02 pm   Opinions on snow?

     i'm still trying to figure out what color it is

2.7.20  3:01 pm   What are you doing this second?

     answering this question

2.7.20  2:54 pm   why is the world so dumb and stupid

     due to intelligence

2.7.20  2:48 pm   can you help me find my place in all this?

     yes

2.7.20  2:38 pm   what happens to steve after the hi im steve video

     gets dry, goes to next gig

2.7.20  2:36 pm   I've been hearing that your working on a big project including 3D.

     i am not working on 1 project. i am learning the skills necessary to incorporate 3D fully into any project

      Is this true and if so how much longer will it take?

     possibly about 100 years

2.7.20  2:19 pm   do you think faster

     yes, and slower. i like to change the pace at which i think. Actually, this would be required, for thoughts to even exist in the first place

2.7.20  2:08 pm   what is your favorite method of transportation, aka vehicle?

     escalator

2.7.20  2:07 pm   should i name my first born child after you

     only if i don't know about it

2.7.20  1:45 pm   how many different names are there for that one game where you have a ball and paddle and try and remove all the rectangles? i've counted at least 6

     'tear down the wall', 'brick', ... i'm sure i've seen tear down the wall. brick i am not sure. i might have made that up. hope that helps

2.7.20  1:33 pm   What's a question? 

     nothing

2.7.20  1:22 pm   is the glass half full or half empty?

     that would depend on the past and future of the glass

2.7.20  1:16 pm   What is the question?

     What is the question?

2.7.20  1:03 pm   Do you get enough sleep at night?

     sometimes, and sometimes it is in the day time

2.7.20  12:33 pm   Hello! I'm a huge fan, and I asked a question a while ago and now I can't find it, can you help?

     sure

2.7.20  12:30 pm   My teacher just tricked me into not being lazy. I didn't even realize I was being lazy. I learned something and am better at that thing now. I feel bamboozled, but shouldn't?

     that sounds pretty rightfully bamboozling to me

2.7.20  12:17 pm   I am at school and I hate Spanish class what do I do

     try to come up with a better way to teach spanish

2.7.20  12:16 pm   What is this website?

     billwurtz dot com

2.7.20  12:15 pm   Are you on a break?

     not even close

2.7.20  12:14 pm   What are you doing now?

     trying to fit more numbers inside a number
